channel.title: Yif on Shweata's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Yif on Shweata's Blog

item.title: The Gap Year
item.description: In July 2022, all my undergrad classmates were hustling to figure out Masters, jobs, etc. On the other hand, I boldly decided to take a year off. No plans. A year for myself. Thus the adventurous journey began, journey that took me to 5 big cities, and taught me life and career lessons. I am documenting experiences here for the future me to look back on. Gandhinagar, Curiosity Conference First trip of the gap year.
